alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:06AM CDT until April 15 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR WEST BATON ROUGE...EAST FELICIANA...CENTRAL IBERVILLE AND EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES... At 1106 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clinton to near Addis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Jackson, Clinton, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, Slaughter, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Wilson, Norwood, Westminster, Ramah and Pride. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 135 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 9. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
